last_episode_to_air.name: Laws and Promises
last_episode_to_air.overview: Edward Elric realizes he must make the ultimate sacrifice if he wants to retrieve his brother from the Gate. Hawkeye breaks free from her captors.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
overview: Two young brothers are raised as alchemists, but when they are severely injured trying to perform a forbidden act, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the fabled philosopher's stone.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two young brothers are raised as alchemists, but when they are severely injured trying to perform a forbidden act, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the fabled philosopher's stone.

episodes.name: Those Who Challenge the Sun
episodes.overview: When Edward and Alphonse meet a so-called religious leader who can invoke miracles, they believe he's carrying the philosopher's stone.

episodes.name: Body of the Sanctioned
episodes.overview: Edward and Alphonse struggle over whether they should reveal the truth behind Cornello's miracles -- and possibly ruin the townspeople's lives.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: A young Ed and Al are determined to bring back their dead mother, who was their pillar of strength during dreary times of war.

episodes.name: A Forger's Love
episodes.overview: While on their way to seek out an important man from their childhood, Ed and Al come across a town haunted by a ghostly woman.

episodes.name: The Man with the Mechanical Arm
episodes.overview: Ed and Al hop aboard a train to Central City and quickly find themselves defending the passengers -- including Gen. Hakuro -- from terrorists.

episodes.name: The Alchemy Exam
episodes.overview: Once in Central City, Ed and Al move into the vast mansion of sewing-life alchemist Shou Tucker and begin to prepare for the Alchemy Exam.

episodes.name: Night of the Chimera's Cry
episodes.overview: Now an official State Alchemist, Ed takes a closer look at Tucker's chimera experiments and begins to realize there's something very wrong going on.

episodes.name: The Philosopher's Stone
episodes.overview: A disenchanted Ed resigns from his position as State Alchemist, and when Winry arrives in town, she may be the serial killer's next victim.

episodes.name: Be Thou for the People
episodes.overview: Ed and Al go on assignment to inspect a small mining colony and discover its inhabitants are being heavily taxed by a tyrant and his Alchemist.

episodes.name: The Phantom Thief
episodes.overview: While trying to avoid their meeting with Mustang, Ed and Al end up in a small town and become embroiled in a manhunt for a female Robin Hood.

episodes.name: The Other Brothers Elric (1)
episodes.overview: Ed and Al head to Xenotime in hopes of finding the Philosopher's Stone, but they find only two boys creating a strange red water.

episodes.name: The Other Brothers Elric (2)
episodes.overview: Ed and Al uncover a conspiracy involving the Tringham Brothers' father, his involvement with the red water and the disease that's stricken Xenotime.

episodes.name: Fullmetal VS Flame
episodes.overview: Ed reports back to Mustang in East City, where discussion of Doctor Marcoh and the Philosopher's Stone leads to a duel between Ed and the colonel.

episodes.name: Destruction's Right Hand
episodes.overview: While the shape-shifting Envy disguises himself as Cornello, Ed and Al find Marcoh and learn about the Stone's involvement in the Ishbal Rebellion.

episodes.name: The Ishbal Massacre
episodes.overview: As the Strong Arm Alchemist defends them from the surrounding chaos, Marcoh reveals to the Elrics the vast atrocities of the Ishbal Massacre.

episodes.name: That Which Is Lost
episodes.overview: As Marcoh faces a deadly encounter with Lust, Armstrong and the Elrics flee to Resembool. Ed is sent into a rage when they lose Al in the process.

episodes.name: House of the Waiting Family
episodes.overview: While resting and receiving repairs back in Resembool, Ed visits his mother's grave and Al reveals his concerns about his fading memories.

episodes.name: Marcoh's Notes
episodes.overview: Ed and Al are forced to go in search of another source for Marcoh's book after Lust, Gluttony and Scar burn the First Branch Library to the ground.

episodes.name: The Truth Behind Truths
episodes.overview: Ed and Al are horrified when they learn what the key ingredient in making a Philosopher's Stone is, but they forge ahead to explore an abandoned lab.

episodes.name: Soul of the Guardian
episodes.overview: Several malfunctions in their armor impede Ed and Al as they face off against some tortured souls bound to empty suits.

episodes.name: The Red Glow
episodes.overview: Barry sets off a series of explosions that inadvertently free Greed and the other prisoners. Tucker returns from the dead in a surprising new form.

episodes.name: Created Human
episodes.overview: As Envy, in the form of Basque Grand, gathers the human ingredients to form the Stone, Maes Hughes sets out to rescue the Elrics from Laboratory 5.

episodes.name: Fullmetal Heart
episodes.overview: Edward upsets Winry with his refusal to talk, and Alphonse decides to confront Edward with his questions about artificial souls.

episodes.name: Bonding Memories
episodes.overview: Alphonse runs off and comes face to face with Scar, who's been hiding out among the mercenary-plagued refugees of Ishbal.

episodes.name: Words of Farewell
episodes.overview: When Ed and Al take Winry on a quest to tail Scar and learn more about the Stone, they discover a connection between Lab 5 and the war in Ishbal.

episodes.name: Her Reason
episodes.overview: As Ed, Al and Winry arrive in Rush Valley to retrieve automail, Mustang figures that a high-ranking officer must be responsible for Hughes' death.

episodes.name: Teacher
episodes.overview: Edward and Alphonse fear for their lives when they come face to face with Izumi Curtis, their former teacher, who brings them back to Dublith.

episodes.name: All is One, One is All
episodes.overview: In order to teach them a life lesson and give them time to reflect, Izumi leaves Ed and Al on Yock Island -- the place where she first found them.

episodes.name: The Untainted Child
episodes.overview: Edward and Alphonse discover that the young boy on Yock Island is, all at once, an alchemist, a homunculus and able to transmute his own body.

episodes.name: Assault on South Headquarters
episodes.overview: As the military captures the mysterious Yock Island boy and imprisons him in South Headquarters, Yoki spots Scar among a group of Ishbalans.

episodes.name: Sin
episodes.overview: Envy disguises herself as Bradley and plucks the homunculus child from Izumi. Meanwhile, the boy remembers his past after he eats Stone fragments.

episodes.name: Dante of the Deep Forest
episodes.overview: Izumi drops in on Ed and Al's fight with Wrath, a new homunculus who seeks the rest of Edward's body in order to make himself human.

episodes.name: Al, Captured
episodes.overview: When Martel takes over Al's armor and brings him to Greed's headquarters, it's up to Izumi and Edward to come to the rescue

episodes.name: Theory of Avarice
episodes.overview: With Ed, Izumi and Sig in his custody, Lt. Col. Archer reinstates Shou Tucker as State Alchemist and orders his men to hunt down Greed.

episodes.name: Reunion of the Fallen
episodes.overview: As Edward and Alphonse head out to the Ishbal camp with Winry, Lust is sitting down at a restaurant when a man from her past enters the room.

episodes.name: The Sinner Within
episodes.overview: Ed and Alphonse hope to learn more about the Philosopher's Stone when they lend a hand to a group of Ishbalan refugees being shipped further south.

episodes.name: The Flame Alchemist, The Bachelor Lieutenant & The Mystery of Warehouse 13
episodes.overview: While he investigates Mustang, Lt. Havoc orders his man Falman to find him a girlfriend. Later, Mustang must investigate the haunted Warehouse 13.

episodes.name: With the River's Flow
episodes.overview: After an argument splits up Ed, Al and Winry, Al bumps into a familiar face, and Winry decides to investigate Hughes' murder with Sheska.

episodes.name: Secret of Ishbal
episodes.overview: Kimblee is named State Alchemist and heads out with the troops to Liore, where Scar is gouging out the earth with a large stone.

episodes.name: The Scar
episodes.overview: After Lust and Gluttony drop in on Edward's confrontation with Scar in Liore, the seventh and final homunculus is finally revealed.

episodes.name: Holy Mother
episodes.overview: With the help of Rose, the Holy Mother, Scar instructs the inhabitants of Liore not to provoke violence as they lure the military into town.

episodes.name: His Name Is Unknown
episodes.overview: With Ed busy aiding the people of Liore, Scar is the only one who can help Alphonse when his armor begins transforming into an explosive compound.

episodes.name: The Stray Dog
episodes.overview: While the Elric Brothers flee Liore, Winry meets a complete stranger in Resembool who is later introduced to her as Ed and Al's father.

episodes.name: Hohenheim of Light
episodes.overview: As the Elrics' father, Hohenhelm of Light, sets out to confront the leader of the Homunculi, Lyra and Rose find a secret stairway in an old church.

episodes.name: A Rotted Heart
episodes.overview: A complex and entangled history reveals itself as Van Hohenheim of Light battles Dante, the leader of the Homunculi.

episodes.name: Human Transmutation
episodes.overview: The brothers are in danger when they become separated. Ed returns to Dante's mansion to look for clues. Al meets with the deranged Shou Tucker.

episodes.name: Sealing the Homunculus
episodes.overview: Wrath believes that Sloth is his real mother. Sloth battles Shou Tucker. Ed realizes that Al has been tricked by Tucker.

episodes.name: Goodbye
episodes.overview: Armstrong declares an uprising against the Führer on the northern border while Ed, joined by Izumi, fights the remaining Homunculi in Central.

episodes.name: The Other Side of the Gate
episodes.overview: King Bradley comes home to give his son a birthday gift. Edward meets with Russell in an abandoned church. Maria and Denny arrive to support Izumi.

episodes.name: Death
episodes.overview: Edward Elric arrives in World War I after being pulled through the Gate. Roy Mustang confronts his enemy, Homunculus Pride.

episodes.name: Laws and Promises
episodes.overview: Edward Elric realizes he must make the ultimate sacrifice if he wants to retrieve his brother from the Gate. Hawkeye breaks free from her captors.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Two young brothers are raised as alchemists, but when they are severely injured trying to perform a forbidden act, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the fabled philosopher's stone.
